item.title: Sentry.io Self Hosted and SaaS
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://blog.sentry.io/2021/12/15/sentrys-response-to-log4j-vulnerability-cve-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL Not affected as it is written in Python and Rust.
